attributes.action: Sieze Trump’s UK Assets and stop him from dictating UK foreign policy.
attributes.background: President Trump has withdrawn from the Iran Nuclear. He intends to stop other countries’ businesses from trading with Iran by imposing sanctions. We cannot allow Trump to dictate UK foreign policy so for every sanction applied to a UK company we sieze all of Trumps UK assets.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament don't have the power to seize someone's assets in this way.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/219586
